items.value: %113% has concocted a plan that will further enrage the people of %01@ against %11@. On your signal, %83b will start setting it up. Tempers are already high between the two factions. Doing this will likely trigger a war between the two.
%113% killed an innocent civilian member of %01@ and made it look like it was done by a member of %11@. The people of %01@ demanded vengeance and %00@ was forced to declare war on %11@.
%113% did not proceed with the plan.
%113% attempted and failed to spark a war between %01@ and %11@!

%113% killed an innocent civilian member of %01@ and made it look like it was done by a member of %11@. The people of %01@ demanded vengeance but cooler heads prevailed and the two factions resolved the misunderstanding.
